title: Break Yurgir's Contract
content:
osen to kill Yurgir. Also, your relationship with Astarion will be all but jeopardized if earlier on you agreed to help him discover the meaning of the scars on his back via parleying with Raphael.

How to unlock Break Yurgir's Contract

Quest Giver: Yurgir / Location (X:-650, Y:-754)

Break Yurgir's Contract Rewards

Rewards from Yurgir: Yurgir offers you anything leftover in his lair for you to scavenge, the most notable piece of loot being located in a chest (X:-633, Y:-719), which contains a
